https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/zwao2YMsqf27IzNEtDNWSe0W9jH.jpg When reporter Jean Craddock interviews Bad Blake—an alcoholic, seen-better-days country music legend—they connect, and the hard-living crooner sees a possible saving grace in a life with Jean and her young son. Crazy Heart
